title: Watercolor painting: imaginative designs with Alex Ross
brief_description: Brilliant patterns of high-level color and semi-abstract forms emerge as the celebrated illustrator-painter demonstrates his work in his studio, and also shows his use of acrylic paint on a board producing compositions with an emotional dream-like quality.
